Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>Have you seen how unsettled things are
around here? Monsters are everywhere!

So I came up with this idea... I'll hang up
a <clr:0000>picture of Octorok Lake <clr:ffff>when it looks
like a monster, and that'll scare them off.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>The lake is south of here, and it looks like
any ol' lake until the <clr:0000>water rises<clr:ffff>. Then it
takes the<clr:0000> shape of an Octorok monster<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>The thing is,<sp:5:0:0> it's not a good idea to leave
the stable unattended just to go paint a
picture.<sp:5:0:0> You know?
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Thanks to you, Link, I feel much more
at ease.<sp:0:4:0>This intimidating lake will definitely scare
off any monsters that threaten the stable.
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>What?<sp:5:0:0> Did you bring me a <clr:0000>picture of
Octorok Lake in the shape of an Octorok<clr:ffff>?
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Please leave our flower garland alone.
If you really want one...

try picking one up at <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
in the mountain range to the southwest
of here.
DoNotWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>You like that, do you? It's nice, isn't it?
I hear they're all the rage right now.

I guess those things got their start in
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>. I've been told a little
girl makes them all on her own!
The village is southwest of here in
Necluda, so if you ever pass through,
you should see if you can find one.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_00>If <clr:0000>Octorok Lake looks like an Octorok
monster <clr:ffff>when the water rises...a rainy
day could be a good time to check it out.
DoNotWakka_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Look, I can see you've taken a liking
to it, but that belongs to the stable, so
it's not yours to have.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>If you want one of your own, just visit
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>. It's southwest of here!
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>If you happen to have a <clr:0000>picture of
Octorok Lake in the shape of an Octorok<clr:ffff>,
I sure hope you'll show it to me.
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Aha! This is just right! Now we'll have a
monster of our own to protect us.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>I tell you, I could paint pictures of
<clr:0000>Octorok Lake looking like a monster<clr:ffff>
all day.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So, if you have an image of the lake that
you like better, bring it by and I'll use it
as inspiration for a new painting!
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I have to say, the lake really does look
like a big monster.

<snd:Angry_00>The best way to fight monsters is with
your own monsters, right?<sp:5:0:0> Yeah, I just
know this painting is going to protect us!
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oh, that's right.<sp:5:0:0> Did you meet <clr:0000>Malanya<clr:ffff>
at Bloodleaf Lake to the north?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I hear that if he takes a liking to you, he
can boost your horse's abilities or even
bring your equine friend back to life!
It sounds far-fetched, but it'd be fantastic
if it's true.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>How lucky would our stable be if a horse
god like that decided to reside here?
I can only imagine!
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>If I could hang a <clr:0000>picture of Octorok Lake
when it's in the shape of an Octorok<clr:ffff>...
I just know it'd help keep monsters away.
Ah, but I don't have time to go all the way
there and paint it. So who knows how
this'll ever get done.
9007: It's fine the way it is.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>A painting of a monster-shaped lake!
What a perfect way to ward off monsters!
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Anyway,<sp:5:0:0> is there something you'd like to
do with that <clr:0000>picture of Octorok Lake<clr:ffff>?
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I see it's your first time with us here at
<clr:0000>East Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>, so here you go...
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>It's both your first time at <clr:0000>East Akkala
Stable<clr:ffff> and you've <clr:0000>registered a horse<clr:ffff>,
so here...
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>So<sp:5:0:0> I did some thinking about what kind of
picture I'd like to hang up.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>There's this big lake right to the <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> of
here called <clr:0000>Octorok Lake<clr:ffff>.

It looks like any other lake at first glance,
but when the <clr:0000>water level rises<clr:ffff>...it takes
the shape of a monster called an Octorok!
That's how it got its name, I suppose.


<sp:3:0:2:0101>Anyway, I'd like to paint a <clr:0000>picture of
Octorok Lake when it looks like an
Octorok <clr:ffff>and hang it on the wall.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>And who knows, with all the monsters
showing up lately, maybe it'll help keep
them away.
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sad_00>The thing is,<sp:5:0:0> I can't exactly leave the
stable unattended just to go paint
a picture.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But if I had a picture of <clr:0000>Octorok Lake in
its Octorok shape<clr:ffff> right in front of me,<sp:5:0:0>
well, <sp:5:0:0>I'm sure I could paint it.
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>You <clr:0000>stayed in a regular bed<clr:ffff> during your
first visit with us at <clr:0000>East Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>,
so here...
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>What's that?<sp:5:0:0> You have a <clr:0000>picture of
Octorok Lake<clr:ffff>?
